Millie Florence Selover

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Mildred
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: George E. Gilbert
  4. Location of Family: Coleridge, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Laurel, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 10
  8. Date of Birth: Unknown
  9. Gender: female
  10. Source: Laurel Advocate, 6 June 1902; National Orphan Train Complex.
